bibl.title: Deir el-Bahari in the Hellenistic and Roman Periods. A Study of an Egyptian Temple Based on Greek Sources. (The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume IV.)

publisher.orgName: Warsaw University - The Raphael Taubenschlag Foundation

bibl.biblScope: front. coul., fac-sim. et 8 plans + 20 figg. sur 19 pll.
bibl.note: Cult activity in Deir el-Bahari in Ptolemaic and Roman times. Catalogue of sources: Wall inscriptions; - Ostraca (O. Cair. Inv. 67300 [= S.B. V, 8266; Pack2 2489]; - O. Lond. Inv. 1900, 1120.625 [ed.: Ulrich WILCKEN, Zur ägyptisch hellenistischen Literatur, Aegyptiaca. Festschrift für Georg Ebers zum 1.3.1897 (Leipzig, 1897) pp. 142-146]; - O. Deir el-Bahari sans No. d'Inv. [= S.B. III, 6183]; - Stone inscriptions. - Indices. Concordance with publications. Chronological table of sources. Bibliography.
